references.paper_title: Dense semantic contrast for self-supervised visual representation learning
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel dense contrastive learning method which is the baseline for this paper's work.

references.paper_title: Unsupervised learning of dense visual representations
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for learning dense visual representations without supervision, which is relevant to the paper's focus on unsupervised learning.

references.paper_title: DenseCL: A simple framework for self-supervised dense visual pre-training
references.reason: This paper proposes a simple framework for self-supervised dense visual pre-training, which is a relevant approach to the paper's focus on dense contrastive representation learning.

references.paper_title: Exploring set similarity for dense self-supervised representation learning
references.reason: This paper explores set similarity for dense self-supervised representation learning, which is a similar approach to the paper's method.

references.paper_title: Propagate yourself: Exploring pixel-level consistency for unsupervised visual representation learning
references.reason: This paper explores pixel-level consistency for unsupervised visual representation learning, which is a relevant concept to the paper's work.
